message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm very interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $750000 is a significant amount for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $825000. It's a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with $825000. I'm willing to pay $775000 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle this time.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $812500. This is as low as I can go without compromising the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $800000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
